title: SerpStat SEO Data
overviewMarkdown: Get comprehensive SEO data including keyword research, competitor analysis, backlink data, and SERP analysis using the SerpStat API. This plugin provides access to SerpStat's extensive database for SEO professionals and marketers.

userSettings.name: serpstatAPIKey
userSettings.label: SerpStat API Key
userSettings.description: Get your API key from SerpStat: https://serpstat.com/users/profile/api/

userSettings.name: defaultDatabase
userSettings.label: Default Database
userSettings.description: Default search engine database to use

userSettings.name: maxResults
userSettings.label: Maximum Results
userSettings.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-1000)

openaiSpec.name: keyword_research
openaiSpec.description: Get comprehensive keyword data including search volume, competition, CPC, and related keywords for SEO research

query.description: The keyword or phrase to research

database.description: Search engine database (e.g., g_us for Google US). If not specified, uses default from settings.

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-1000). If not specified, uses default from settings.

openaiSpec.name: competitor_analysis
openaiSpec.description: Analyze competitors' organic and paid search performance, top keywords, and market share

database.description: Search engine database (e.g., g_us for Google US). If not specified, uses default from settings.

analysisType.description: Type of competitor analysis to perform

openaiSpec.name: backlink_analysis
openaiSpec.description: Get backlink data for a domain including referring domains, anchor texts, and link quality metrics

domain.description: The domain to analyze backlinks for (e.g., example.com)

limit.description: Number of backlinks to return (1-1000). If not specified, uses default from settings.

openaiSpec.name: serp_analysis
openaiSpec.description: Analyze search engine results pages (SERP) for specific keywords, including ranking positions and featured snippets

keyword.description: The keyword to analyze SERP results for

database.description: Search engine database (e.g., g_us for Google US). If not specified, uses default from settings.
